Text: This is the game "The Last Airbender". It is based on Shyamalan's movie. Just wanted to clarify that. Also this is a safe torrent, no viruses.

Only problem (for me) is that game crashes on various levels including earth training grounds and earth village 2. I haven't been able to progress further than earth village 1 as a result of this. Shame.
